meanings.definition: The quality of being able to see things clearly at a distance.
meanings.sent1: His farsightednesses allowed him to spot the mountain from afar.
meanings.sent2: With his farsightednesses, he could read the sign across the street without any trouble.
meanings.sent3: Her farsightednesses were so sharp that she could see the bus coming before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: The captain's farsightednesses in navigation led the ship safely through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The eagle's farsightednesses enabled it to spot its prey from high above.

meanings.definition: The ability to predict or plan for the future with wisdom and foresight.
meanings.sent1: His farsightednesses in investments helped him secure a comfortable retirement.
meanings.sent2: The politician's farsightednesses in policy-making earned her widespread respect.
meanings.sent3: Despite his farsightednesses, he forgot to bring an umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: Her farsightednesses in business turned her small startup into a successful company.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's farsightednesses in curriculum development improved student learning outcomes.
